configurationItems.Name: Area of Interest (AOI) Radius
configurationItems.HelpText: Operationally set relevant AOI

configurationItems.Name: Drop Track Timer
configurationItems.HelpText: Drop reported tracks prior to STANAG 5516 retransmission time

configurationItems.Name: J12.6 Environment
configurationItems.HelpText: Land (Env=5), Surface (Env=3), and No Statement (Env = 0) Service filter J12.6 messages from other environments

configurationItems.Name: J12.6 Lockout Period
configurationItems.HelpText: Prevent response to repeated/retransmitted J12.6 messages

configurationItems.Name: J12.6 Originator JU
configurationItems.HelpText: List of JUs authorized to trigger service Service filter J12.6 messages from extra JUs

configurationItems.Name: J12.6 Reporting Area
configurationItems.HelpText: Geographic area to respond to J12.6 Service filter J12.6 messages from outside geographic reporting area

configurationItems.Name: J12.6 SID
configurationItems.HelpText: 0, 9, 10 Service filter J12.6 messages with other settings

configurationItems.Name: J3.2 Emergency Indicator
configurationItems.HelpText: Emergency Indicator not set unless PLI ALERT status indicates it or operationally directed

configurationItems.Name: J3.2 Force Tell Indicator
configurationItems.HelpText: Force Tell Indicator set unless operationally directed otherwise

configurationItems.Name: J3.2 Passive/Active Sensor
configurationItems.HelpText: Fixed Value

configurationItems.Name: J3.2 Track Quality
configurationItems.HelpText: If reported information does not enable computation of Track Quality

configurationItems.Name: J3.5 Emergency Indicator
configurationItems.HelpText: Emergency Indicator not set unless PLI ALERT status indicates it or operationally directed

configurationItems.Name: J3.5 Force Tell Indicator
configurationItems.HelpText: Force Tell Indicator set unless operationally directed otherwise

configurationItems.Name: J3.5 Passive/Active Sensor
configurationItems.HelpText: Fixed Value

configurationItems.Name: J3.5 Track Quality
configurationItems.HelpText: If reported information does not enable computation of Track Quality

configurationItems.Name: Maximum PLI Age
configurationItems.HelpText: Operationally set maximum age

configurationItems.Name: Number of PLI to report
configurationItems.HelpText: Operationally determine to reduce aircraft display clutter and provide most relevant data

configurationItems.Name: Text	Message (J28.2(0)) Enable
configurationItems.HelpText: NO (When ‘Text Message Enable’ is NO, do not transmit J28.2(0) to report the number of J3.x messages transmitted.)Only	transmit	J28.2(0) if operationally desired by WDA

configurationItems.Name: Transmit Text Message (J28.2(0)) with DISTANCE (Optional capability)
configurationItems.HelpText: Only transmit J28.2(0) with DISTANCE if operationally desired by WDA

configurationItems.Name: Transmit “No PLI Response” J28.2(0) (Optional capability)
configurationItems.HelpText: Only transmit “No PLI Response” J28.2(0) if operationally desired by WDA

configurationItems.Name: C2/NonC2
configurationItems.HelpText: pick either:  "C2"  or "Non C2"

configurationItems.Name: JRE ID
configurationItems.HelpText: JRE ID assigned to you Data Link Server

configurationItems.Name: JREAP Time Sync (Preferred)
configurationItems.HelpText: pick either:  "UTC"  or "RTT"

configurationItems.Name: JREAP Time Sync (Supported)
configurationItems.HelpText: pick either:  "UTC"  or "RTT"

configurationItems.Name: Maximum Offset
configurationItems.HelpText: Time in seconds

configurationItems.Name: Platform Role
configurationItems.HelpText: pick either: "active", "semi-active", "passive".

configurationItems.HelpText: Track number block assigned to Active Platform

configurationItems.Name: URL Track Store
configurationItems.HelpText: URL to connect to the Track Store (i.e TSS URL)

configurationItems.HelpText: Enter the Message Standards used: i.e. NFFI 1.3,  FFI XML MTF - APP-11(D)(1)

configurationItems.Name: FFT Protocols Supported
configurationItems.HelpText: Enter the Protocols Supported: i.e. D-Doc NFFI IP1, D-Doc NFFI IP2, SIP3 1.1 Req/Res, SIP3 1.1 Pub/Sub, ADatP-36 IP1, ADatP-36 IP2, ADatP-36 SIP3 1.2 Req/Res, ADatP-36 SIP3 1.2 Pub/Sub, ADatP-36 WSMP 1.1 Req/Res, ADatP-36 WSMP 1.1 Pub/Sub.
